hero.subheader1: Complete Islamic Knowledge Taught by Scholars

welcome.complete_curriculum: Begin or continue your studies with our complete curriculum covering all the religious sciences
welcome.mission: Our mission is to link students to true scholars, who connect them to the Noble Prophet (ﷺ).
welcome.online: Access your lessons and recordings wherever you are—learning always goes on.
welcome.articles: Benefit now from the library of articles and videos that will continue tog row inshaAllah

articles.fard-ayn: The Mandatory Knowledge Every Muslim Must Learn
articles.knowledge-good-intentions: Good Intentions – Advice for Students of Knowledge 1
articles.curing-laziness: Curing Languor and Laziness in Seeking Knowledge

tajwid-amma.title: Level 1: Open-book Recitation
tajwid-amma.desc: Recitation is a pillar of prayer—apply the rules of tajwid to these regularly read surah!

fiqh-nur.desc: Essential rules for a Muslim's worship and all things related to that

fiqh-quduri.title: Fiqh of Interactions: 1
fiqh-quduri.desc: Essential rules for a Muslim's dealings  with Allah's creation and his relations

aqidah-ahl-sunnah.title: Beliefs: Essentials
aqidah-ahl-sunnah.desc: The obligatory beliefs for every Muslim in a brief and simple text

tasawwuf-tuhfah.desc: Rectifying worship, regular actions, and repairing the bad traits of the heart

tasawwuf-fuyud.title: Spirituality: Essentials
tasawwuf-fuyud.desc: A collection of commanding hadith, with explanations to help bring them to life

aqidah-sharh-nazm.title: Beliefs: Level 1
aqidah-sharh-nazm.desc: A masterful educational poem that's approachable yet vast, with an explanation and commentary

aqidah-tali.title: Beliefs: Level 2
aqidah-tali.desc: An expert explanation for this major text. This level is sufficient for students not specialzing in beliefs

aqidah-miftah.title: Beliefs: Level 3
aqidah-miftah.desc: A summary of over 50 works in Creed, this book opens the doors of advanced topics to come

aqidah-jawharah.title: Beliefs: Level 4
aqidah-jawharah.desc: A complete poem of beliefs and everything related to creed

aqidah-taftazani.title: Beliefs: Level 5
aqidah-taftazani.desc: An explanation of a brief yet comprehensive book containing the Sunni beliefs of those who lean to intellectual investigation

aqidah-tahrir.title: Beliefs: Level 6
aqidah-tahrir.desc: A deep dive and joruney through the range of views

fiqh-maslak.title: Fiqh: Level 2
fiqh-maslak.desc: A complete study of the rulings related to acts of worship: purification, prayer, fasting, zakah & hajj

fiqh-lubab.title: Fiqh: Level 3
fiqh-lubab.desc: A later work that gathers what came before it to explain the most important Hanafi book

fiqh-hidayah.title: Fiqh: Level 4
fiqh-hidayah.desc: The source and key for every book in the Madhhab that came after it

fiqh-rad.title: Fiqh: Level 5
fiqh-rad.desc: The book relied upon for issuing rulings in the Hanafi madhhab

fiqh-manar.title: Fiqh: Foundations 1
fiqh-manar.desc: A brief, comprehensive introduction for the student of foundations and seeker of results

fiqh-isad.title: Fiqh: Principles 2
fiqh-isad.desc: A poem and explanation explaining everything needed by a Mufti or anyone working with fiqh and the madhhab.

tasawwuf-bidayah.title: Spirituality
tasawwuf-bidayah.desc: The principles of beginnings, which increase Muslims in good activity and correcting their method in that

tasawwuf-taj.title: Spirituality
tasawwuf-taj.desc: The primer for essential guidance in daily life, worship and seeking

tasawwuf-uyub.title: Spirituality
tasawwuf-uyub.desc: The primer for essential guidance in daily life, worship and seeking

tasawwuf-qasd.title: Spirituality
tasawwuf-qasd.desc: The primer for essential guidance in daily life, worship and seeking

tasawwuf-mabahith.title: Spirituality
tasawwuf-mabahith.desc: The primer for essential guidance in daily life, worship and seeking

tasawwuf-manazil.title: Spirituality
tasawwuf-manazil.desc: The primer for essential guidance in daily life, worship and seeking

tasawwuf-qawanin.title: Spirituality: Reaching 2
tasawwuf-qawanin.desc: One of the most important books of Tasawwuf: innovative in expression and containing major wisdoms in suluk and irfan

tafsir-durrah.title: Tafsir: External 1
tafsir-durrah.desc: Simply phrased, mentioning the incidents of revelation from hadith, with important and precise notes

tafsir-nasafi.title: Tafsir: External 2
tafsir-nasafi.desc: A summary of some of the most important tafsir

hadith-nawawi.title: Hadith: Text 1
hadith-nawawi.desc: Famous Hadith which contain the foundations of the religion and principles of Divine Law

hadith-adab.title: Hadith: Text 2
hadith-adab.desc: A book of Prophetic, educational ettiquette that inspire the Ummah to folow and be adorned by them

hadith-riyad.title: Hadith: Text 3
hadith-riyad.desc: A short collection of strong hadith, with rectification for our hearts and actions, making clear the way to the afterlife

hadith-bayquni.title: Hadith: Terminology 1
hadith-bayquni.desc: Introducing the most famous Hadith sciences and the needed explanations and terminology

hadith-salah.title: Hadith: Terminology 3
hadith-salah.desc: The work that changed the field

hadith-tadrib.title: Hadith: Terminology 4
hadith-tadrib.desc: The level for complete campacity in hadith science

sirah-halabi.title: Seerah 1
sirah-halabi.desc: A refined edition of a trusted reference in Prophetic Biography, containing fluid writing, accurate reports and deep explanations

sirah-wasail.title: Shamail 1
sirah-wasail.desc: A brief book that gathers the traits of the Prophet, blessings and peace upon him, with explanations

other-isa.title: Logic
other-isa.desc: An explanation of the foundational text in the study of Logic
